name: NBA Live 98
overview: NBA Live '98 brings the furious action of 5 on 5 basketball to the Playstation. A fully licensed product, this title includes all 29 NBA teams from the 1997-'98 season. Featuring user-controlled dunking and passing, a wide variety of moves, and players who actually look like their real-life counterparts. NBA Live '98 supports up to 8 players via Multi-Tap, so you can play with ALL of your friends. When the action gets too intense, you can challenge either the computer or your friends (or both) to the 3-point shoot out contest. Basketball fans will enjoy full 82 game season play, complete with full stat tracking around the league. Play by play is handled by Verne Lundquist, the voice of TNT and TBS NBA broadcasts. If you're looking for the real thing, you've come to the right place with NBA Live '98.
